price: Gutyo inyuma y’iryo rokorwa, bakagarariza mu kwihakana bivuye inyuma inema Twebwe Allah Twabahaye, bakaryoherwa n’ivy’isi. Bitebe bitebuke, bazomenya ko ibikorwa vyabo vyabaye impfagusa, igihe babonye ibihano bategekanirijwe ku musi w’izuka.
arabic: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلِيَتَمَتَّعُواْۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

meta.transliteration: liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum waliyatamattaʿū fasawfa yaʿlamūna
